-- | Transformer for Data.Tree
--   
--   This library implements a transformer for the Data.Tree package
@package TreeT
@version 0.0

module Control.TreeT
data TreeT m a
TreeT :: (m (Tree a)) -> TreeT m a
instance MonadIO m => MonadIO (TreeT m)
instance Applicative m => Applicative (TreeT m)
instance Functor m => Functor (TreeT m)
instance MonadTrans TreeT
instance Monad m => Monad (TreeT m)
